title: From Portfolio Optimization to Quantum Blockchain and Security: A Systematic Review of Quantum Computing in Finance. (arXiv:2307.01155v1 [cs.CR])
abstract: In this paper, we provide an overview of the recent work in the quantum finance realm from various perspectives. The applications in consideration are Portfolio Optimization, Fraud Detection, and Monte Carlo methods for derivative pricing and risk calculation. Furthermore, we give a comprehensive overview of the applications of quantum computing in the field of blockchain technology which is a main concept in fintech. In that sense, we first introduce the general overview of blockchain with its main cryptographic primitives such as digital signature algorithms, hash functions, and random number generators as well as the security vulnerabilities of blockchain technologies after the merge of quantum computers considering Shor's quantum factoring and Grover's quantum search algorithms. We then discuss the privacy preserving quantum-resistant blockchain systems via threshold signatures, ring signatures, and zero-knowledge proof systems i.e. ZK-SNARKs in quantum resistant blockchains. translated_title: 从投资组合优化到量子区块链和安全性：量子计算在金融领域的系统综述
translated_abstract: 本文从不同角度对量子金融领域的最新研究进行了概述。所考虑的应用包括投资组合优化、欺诈检测以及用于衍生品定价和风险计算的蒙特卡罗方法。此外，我们对量子计算在区块链技术领域的应用进行了全面的综述，这是金融科技中的一个主要概念。在这方面，我们首先介绍了区块链的总体概述，以及其主要的加密原语，如数字签名算法、哈希函数和随机数生成器，以及在量子计算机融合后考虑了Shor的量子因式分解算法和Grover的量子搜索算法后的区块链技术的安全漏洞。然后我们讨论了通过阈值签名、环签名和零知识证明系统（即ZK-SNARKs）在量子抗性区块链中实现隐私保护的方法。...
tldr: 本文综述了量子计算在金融领域的最新研究，包括投资组合优化、欺诈检测和衍生品定价风险计算。此外，还概述了量子计算在区块链技术中的应用以及相关的安全性考虑。
en_tdlr: This paper provides an overview of the recent work in quantum finance, including portfolio optimization, fraud detection, and derivative pricing risk calculation. It also discusses the applications of quantum computing in blockchain technology and the associated security considerations.
